admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The principal aim of the project is to
            assist the Government in promoting balanced economic
            development through improvements in the efficiency of the
            land transport system.  In order to enable the road
            transport sector to better meet the needs of growing traffic
            between agricultural areas, commercial centers and ports as
            well as from tourism developments, in a cost-effective
            manner, the project aims at: (1) upgrading and improving the
            road network; (2) improving road traffic safety and traffic
            management; (3) strengthening the capacity of road
            authorities to manage the road network; and (4) improving
            sector policies in the key areas of maintenance practices
            and funding, control of road damage by heavy vehicles, road
            user taxation, and increased construction efficiency through
            the introduction of contracting of roadworks to the private
            sector on a competitive basis.
